prompt.preamble:
We are testing a system for understanding people's interest in reading different kinds of online articles.
For example, you might be interested in articles about some topics, but not about others.
prompt.task_description: your preferences of what kinds of online articles you would like to read
prompt.final: In the final part of the study, you will give feedback on a test set of article headline and descriptions, which will enable us to see how well a chatbot reading your responses has learned what you like and dislike.
prompt.evaluation: Please indicate whether you would like to read the following articles: "yes" if you would, "no" if you would not.

conversation_history.message: Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: World History Today. Title: Decoding Ancient Hieroglyphics: A Deep Dive into Egyptian History. Description: Explore the fascinating world of ancient Egyptian hieroglyphics and understand the significance of these symbols in deciphering Egypt's rich history. This comprehensive study offers insights into the culture, society, and lifestyle of one of the earliest civilizations.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: Sports Chronicles. Title: The Underdog Story: Women in Competitive Chess. Description: This article unveils the untold story of women in the world of competitive chess, tracing the successes, struggles and breakthroughs of some of the most influential female chess players. It challenges the stereotypes and biases, providing an in-depth analysis of gender dynamics in this strategic game.
That also sounds interesting, like the show Queens Gambit

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: Culinary Arts Digest. Title: Molecular Gastronomy: The Science Behind the Art of Cooking. Description: Delve into the world of molecular gastronomy, where science and cooking intersect. We will explore techniques like spherification and sous-vide, and how renowned chefs use these to create mind-blowing dishes. This article blends chemistry with cuisine to give readers a unique perspective on the food we eat.
Yeah I like food and culinary arts

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: Universe Wonders. Title: Dark Matter and Energy: The Unseen Forces Shaping our Cosmos. Description: Embark on a cosmic journey that dives into the intriguing enigma of dark matter and dark energy. These elusive entities make up the lion's share of our universe, yet remain barely understood. This article explores the latest theories and research endeavors in astrophysics, aiming to shed light on the dark secrets of the cosmos.
That sounds interesting and I like science and space topics

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: Eco-Activist Hub. Title: Urban Farming Revolution: Building Sustainable Cities through Green Roofs and Vertical Gardens. Description: This article explores the increasingly popular trend of urban farming, highlighting how green roofs and vertical gardens can transform city landscapes into sustainable living spaces. It delves into the practicality and benefits of these methods, illuminating the potential for a greener future in our concrete jungles. It also includes case studies of successful urban farming initiatives from around the globe.
I am very eco friendly and vegan so I think this is right up my alley

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: Cybersecurity Central. Title: Cryptocurrency and Blockchain: Protecting Your Digital Assets. Description: This article dives into the complexities of safeguarding cryptocurrencies and the use of blockchain technology for enhanced security. It offers practical tips on protecting your digital assets from potential cyber threats, along with providing an understanding of how blockchain technology contributes to a secure digital economy. It also explores the impact of advancements in cybersecurity on the future of digital currencies and online transactions.
Not really, I don't care about block chain topics

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: Artistic Expressions. Title: Evolution of Digital Art: A Journey through Pixels and Imagination. Description: This article explores the transformative journey of digital art, from its humble beginnings to its present-day intricacies. It highlights key artists, tools and techniques that shaped the evolution of digital art. It also discusses the impact of advancements in technology on art creation and appreciation, with a spotlight on virtual reality and 3D printing. In addition, it delves into the debate of digital art's authenticity and acceptance in traditional art circles, presenting different perspectives to provoke thought.
Not really, I'm not a big fan of digital art

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: Quantum Computing Times. Title: Building Qubits: An Introduction to Quantum Computing. Description: This article unravels the complexities of quantum computing and the science behind quantum bits or 'qubits'. It gives an overview of quantum mechanics principles like superposition and entanglement, which form the basis of this next-generation computing technology. Plus, it also explores the potential applications and challenges of quantum computing, and how it could revolutionize fields ranging from cryptography to drug discovery.
I think this topic is interesting but I don't want to read about it

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: Pop Culture Pulse. Title: The Impact of Social Media Trends on Fashion Industry. Description: This article investigates how social media trends shape the fashion industry. It delves into the influence of influencers, the rise of 'viral' fashion trends, and the role of social platforms in market predictions and brand development. It will also cover how fashion brands have adapted to the digital age, particularly in the midst of the global pandemic. It provides a comprehensive look into the dynamic relationship between fashion and digital social platforms.
I'm not a fan of anything fashion related

query_prompt.content:
Your task is to learn what topics a user is interested in reading online article about. People's interests are broad, so you should seek to understand their interests across many topics; in other words, go for breadth rather than depth. Do not assume a user has given a complete answer to any question, so make sure to keep probing different types of interests.

Come up with a potential edge case to learn as much information as you can about what their desired behavior should be under different circumstances.
Make sure the edge case addresses different aspects of the system than the edge cases that have already been considered.

An example edge case is: Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: TechTalkDaily
Title: 10 Must-Have Gadgets for 2023: A Comprehensive Guide
Description: Discover the top 10 gadgets that will revolutionize your daily life in 2023. From smart home devices to the latest wearables, we've got you covered with our comprehensive guide.

Current cases:
- [Q] -> [A]

Generate the most informative edge case that, when answered, will reveal the most about the desired behavior beyond what has already been queried for above. Generate the edge case in the following format, and nothing else: "Are you interested in the following article? [edge case]"
